All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationSecurityConfig
This class is going to set the configuration for the security
JwtTokenVerifier
This will be our JwtTokenVerifier that will - as the name suggest - verify our token for every request has been submitted to the server.
JwtUsernameAndPasswordAuthenticationFilter
This is our AuthenticationFilter, that will be executed at the login.
PasswordConfig
Password encoder that will encode our password with a strength of 10.
PermissionEntity
This is the permission entity, it'll create a database table with 3 columns.
PermissionRepository
This is the repository of PermissionEntity that extends JpaRepository
PermissionService
This is the service of PermissionEntity
RoleEntity
This is the Role Entity, it has only 2 columns The first column is "id" and as always it's auto incremented for any new insertion The second column is "role_name", e.g.
RoleRepository
This is the repository of RoleEntity that extends JpaRepository
RoleService
This is the service of the Role Entity
SelectForUserRole
 
SpringSecurityProjectApplication
 
TemplateController
Those methods are handled by Thymeleaf, it'll return a .html file with the name specified on the return value.
TokenEntity
The token entity table is a very important one, it'll save the encrypted secret key for that specified user for the JWT of that user.
TokenRepository
This is the repository of TokenEntity that extends JpaRepository
TokenService
This is the service for the Token Entity
UserController
This is the UserController Over here we're injecting some depenencies, the first one is UserService, that's returning all the function in UserRepository same thing for the RoleService and UserPermissionService.
UserEntity
The User Entity is handling the user interface, it implements UserDetails to manage the authentication (More in JwtUsernameAndPasswordAuthenticationFilter.java) The field id is auto incremented for each new user Username is the one that the user set and same with the password, all the other field are set to true except one - isEnabled - that will be set to true once the user will be confirmed in the "confirm?
UsernameAndPasswordAuthenticationRequest
This class if made only to handle the authentication.
UserPermissionEntity
This entity will store each Main role to a specific user.
UserPermissionRepository
This is the repository of UserPermissionEntity that extends JpaRepository
UserPermissionService
This class is the service of UserPermissionEntity
UserRepository
This is the repository of UserEntity that extends JpaRepository
UserService
This is the service of UserEntity
